title: Ori and the Blind Forest Definitive Edition Download
description:
Get Ori and the Blind Forest DE for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
The forest of N i bel is dying. After a powerful storm sets a series of devastating events in motion, Ori must journey to find courage and confront a dark nemesis to save the forest of Nibel. “Ori and the Blind Forest” tells the tale of a young orphan destined for heroics, through a visually stunning Action-Platformer crafted by Moon Studios. Forza Horizon 2
Featuring hand-painted artwork, meticulously animated character performance, a fully orchestrated score and dozens of new features in the Definitive Edition, “Ori and the Blind Forest” explores a deeply emotional story about love and sacrifice, and the hope that exists in us all. The plot of the game tells about a small white animal, which turned out from an ordinary leaf that fell from a branch of the Tree of Spirits.
As a result, a small animal named Ori was picked up by a local inhabitant of Naru, who decided to raise a real hero out of him. But one day something happens – the Tree of Spirits suddenly loses all its strength and ceases to feed the forest with its energy, Naru dies, while Ori decides to go to the tree and find out what happened. But he hardly approaches the tree when he also begins to die. The tree gives him its last energy and sends him on a journey in which Ori must do everything possible to save the forest and the Spirit Tree itself.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 – 1024 MB (1 gig)
